pages.title: about
pages.text: Welcomeï¼ï¼ Welcome to Cloud.sirâ€™s personal blog. This is my second blog. It took me more than half a month to make this space. But this is not my first blog. I created the first blog in early 2018. At that time, I was still in school. It was a very simple blog. After I finished it, it remained in the folder without touching him.ðŸ¤¤ðŸ¤¤ðŸ¤¤ Until now, I wrote the second version.
